en.about_text: Local from Lanzarote, my family says that I'm intelligent, so I learnt to read and the table of two with five years. I'm a science and technology boy, although my curiosity have led me to read some personal development books. I like surfing, I listen and research music in different languages, hence I studied Telecommunications Engineering degree, where I fell in love with programming.

2024, Dec. â€“ 2025, Nov. Vumi (https://www.vumi.io/) â€“ Finacial Aggregator.

Web Scraping/Crawling developer

100% remotely job.

  • Scrape public data from government entities from the countries where the company offers the services (Spain, Portugal, LATAM, Brazil).
  • Maintenance of existing spiders and development of new ones.
  • Maintenance of the "migration project" (it's a pre-production stage of formatting that comes after the scraping and before going into production), written in grails framework (groovy).
  • Looking for solutions to problems that arises in the tasks mentioned above:
    • Speed up the execution of slow spiders.
    • Speed up the execution of the tests of the migration project in order to, at the same time, speed up the development of any feature of this project.
    • Automate workflows in order to make the team more productive and agile (e.g. CI/CD with gitlab CI).
    • Scrape pages with strong security measures (e.g. cloudflare, tokens, cookies, javascript page rendering...).
    • Implement Selenium-Grid through Docker to be able to use browsers by spiders simultaneously.
    • Proxies and headers rotation.
    • Extracting information from any text file (pdf, doc and docx).
Used Technologies: Scrapy (Python framework) Â· BeautifulSoup Â· Requests Â· Grails Â· MongoDB Â· Git Â· Linux Â· Docker Â· Gitlab CI Â· Amazon Web Services (AWS)
